section.name: Think about it â€“ Identify number of ELLs in AEFLA-funded programs in the U.S. (cont.)
section.summary:
The correct answer is b. There were 1,389,694 learners served in adult education programs during the 2017-2018 program year.

Now, what percentage of those learners do you think were enrolled specifically in ELA or IELCE programs?

Is it:

  1. 8%
  2. 24%;
  3. 33%; or
  4. 49%

When you have decided on your answer, click the forward arrow for the correct answer.
